english.segment2: Now I see how much You love me. Constant One You will never leave. I will keep in You
english.segment4: You are the One Who gave. All that You had to cover my shame. O no one can deny that You paid this price. You are the One Who gave. You have the only Name with power enough. To take all my blame. O no one can deny that You paid this price. You have the only Name
english.segment6: You remain holding me. When I and lost and stuck out at sea. Though the world may despise this love in Your Eyes. You remain holding me
